articles.title: The 5ft 8in giant whose life was rollicking ride: On turf he gripped millions, not least the Queen - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Queen's favourite jockey, who died in a Swiss hospital yesterday, was a master on the saddle - but his life off the turf was anything but simple
articles.content: As the Queens favourite jockey stood in the dock at Ipswich Crown Court in 1987, having admitted to defrauding Her Majestys Revenue & Customs (to use its modern name) out of £3.25 million in unpa… [+21969 chars]

articles.author: Caleb Sage
articles.title: Newcastle 'still in conversation' to bring £85m star to St James' Park - GIVEMESPORT
articles.description: Newcastle United are “still in the conversation” to sign their £85m target despite recent links to Everton centre-forward Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
articles.content:
Newcastle United are “still in the conversation” to sign Benfica striker Darwin Nunez this summer, claims transfer insider Dean Jones.
